action.text: SA 6515 fell when when the motion to concur in the House amendment to H.R. 7776 with an amendment SA 6513 was withdrawn.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 6515 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 6513. To add an effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6515 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 6513.
